name: Decade (Prototype)
description:
• AWSD to move
  • C to change the camera angle
  • SPACE to brake

This game is still in development. The final release is unknown. However, the demo version will be updated from time to time. This game is basically a simple racing game. Multiplayer mode might be added but it isn't certain. 

Version 1.0-

  • Basic Controls and Car Ai is added
